tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sentiment_results (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    post_content TEXT,
    source VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE SentimentResults (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    post_id INT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    sentiment_category VARCHAR(50),
    date_posted TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Users (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    date_joined TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Posts (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    post_content TEXT,
    date_created TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE SentimentAnalysisResults (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tweet_id INT NOT NULL,
    sentiment VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    confidence FLOAT NOT NULL,
    analyzed_at TIMESTAMP
) 

CREATE TABLE Tweets (
    tweet_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    tweet_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    tweet_time TIMESTAMP
) 

CREATE TABLE Users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
) 

CREATE TABLE Hashtags (
    hashtag_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tweet_id INT NOT NULL,
    hashtag_text VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE SentimentAnalysisResults (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    post_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE PostDetails (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    post_date TIMESTAMP,
    post_content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE UserSentiments (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    positive_sentiment_count INT,
    negative_sentiment_count INT
)

CREATE TABLE UserInteractions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    likes INT,
    comments INT
)

CREATE TABLE PostInteractions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    likes INT,
    comments INT
)
